metadata.title: CVE-2017-9434 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - low
metadata.description:
Crypto++ (aka cryptopp) through 5.6.5 contains an out-of-bounds readvulnerability in zinflate.cpp in the Inflator filter.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-9434` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libcrypto++-utils - 5.6.4-8
libcrypto++8 - 5.6.4-8
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libcrypto++ package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.6.4-8').
